body: Yes - you're really close. If you're passing any flags  (`--delete-namespace=false`) to run-test commands it overwrites all flags (I should finally fix this). In such case you should also pass `--ginkgo.focus="starting 30 pods"` command, to run only Density test (or `--ginkgo.focus="\[Feature:Performance\]"` for both Density and Load tests)
